## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the user can change the visibility of the column; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

Implement this method to enable the table view to provide a menu that allows users to show or hide table columns.

To change a column’s visibility, ensure the column has a title. Further, setting the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSResponder/menu] property on the table view [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/headerView] or, subclassing [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableHeaderView] and overriding the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSResponder/menu] property also prevents the column visibility from changing.

# tableView(_:userCanChangeVisibilityOf:)

**Instance Method**

Asks the delegate to verify that the user can change the given column’s visibility.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func tableView(_ tableView: NSTableView, userCanChangeVisibilityOf column: NSTableColumn) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **tableView**: The table view object requesting this information.
- **column**: The table column affected by the visibility change.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the user can change the visibility of the column; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

Implement this method to enable the table view to provide a menu that allows users to show or hide table columns.

To change a column’s visibility, ensure the column has a title. Further, setting the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSResponder/menu] property on the table view [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/headerView] or, subclassing [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableHeaderView] and overriding the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSResponder/menu] property also prevents the column visibility from changing.

## Showing and hiding columns

- **tableView(_:userDidChangeVisibilityOf:)**: Tells the delegate that the user changed the visibility of one or more table columns.
